body.name: SHOWPIN 122 in 1 Precision Computer Screwdriver Kit, Laptop Screwdriver Sets with 101 Magnetic Drill Bits, Electronics Tool Kit Compatible for Tablet, PC, iPhone, PS4 Repair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 25 mins
features: 【Powerful Functions】122 in 1 precision screwdriver set contains 98 screwdriver bits, 3TorxTR screwdriver bits and 21 auxiliary tools, such as screwdriver handle, flexible shaft, extension rod, magnetizer, magnetic pad, cleaning brush etc. Own this toolkit, you can replace the battery, screen and other parts of the smartphone, tablet, laptop, and upgrade the hard disk and performance of the computer and PC, disassemble and repair PS4, Xbox and other game consoles, repair drones, cameras, etc.

【Practical Repair Tool】This electronic screwdriver set is professionally designed to maximize your repair ability. The screwdriver handle is ergonomically designed, with non-slip particles outside, easy to exert force and rotate smoothly; the 4.56 inch alloy steel extension rod has high hardness, not easy to bend, suitable for narrow gaps; 5.11 inch flexible shaft is composed of CRV springs , which can be bent 180° and rotated 360°, helping you easily deal with complex disassembly environments.

【Quality First】The screwdriver bits in this laptop repair tool kit are made of Cr-V Steel, after high temperature treatment process, the hardness can reach 60HRC, stronger and not easy to damage, suitable for long-term use for repairing Electronics. This computer repair kit is equipped with spare bits for frequently used models( such as phillips, slot, tri-point) to avoid the need to find a new bit or replace a new screwdriver set if the bit is lost or damaged.

【With Professional Storage Case and Magnetizer】This computer tool kit comes with a shockproof plastic storage box, each screwdriver bit is well placed in the corresponding slot, easy to find and store. The included magnetizer can easily enhance the magnetic properties of the screwdriver bit. The 5.7*3.3 inch magnetic pad can absorb small screws and tiny metal parts, no worry about losing screws, or damage electronic components due to strong magnetism.

【Excellent Service】This screwdriver repair kit provides a 90-day refund and lifetime warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best solution within 24 hours. This screwdriver set is designed for disassembled and installation, even an amateur can easily repair electronic devices, making it a great Christmas gift for your husband, father, son or friend, bring them the surprise and fun of maintenance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set with helpful bits and accessories.
reviews.reviewText: Great for general tech work. It’s also handy to have a T20 on hand for basic stuff when working on euro cars. The pry tools could be a little stronger but for the price this set is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Product and works well for the price
reviews.reviewText: For the small price I paid for this product it has been very useful for assembly and disassembly of many products and electronics I would recommend to anyone in need of a handy multi tool

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I got this set for work. Since I work in IT we constantly have to open PC’s open to change out parts or for disposal. This set has worked great no need to run back and forth looking for tools when all you need is right in the case. Tools are durable easy to remove and use. The grip on them are not bad and they look nice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thise product is exactly what I have been looking for when I wanted just some tools to do computer building and taking part. The case it self is tiny and very portable and perfect to put in a bag to carry. The actual tools are made with metal and high end material, all the magnetization is strong and the this product is very neat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars has all the bits you might ever need for multiple electronic applications
reviews.reviewText: I like how the bits are laid out for this set and are easy to pull and use and put back. The extending screw driver and optional flex-shaft are very welcome features. This particular set is for laptop/PC repair work and it more than does the job. The included magnetizer/demagnetizer and multiple pry tools are also fairly well made and have lasted through several openings of laptop casings. I can see this set being useful for Nintendo Switch and Joycon repair specifically, but also would be useful for mobile phone screen replacement, or any other small electronic repair. For the price; even if this set lasts a year of heavy use, it will have been worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the kit to buy!
reviews.reviewText: It’s such a small and handy one to bring with you on the go if you need, doesn’t take up a lot of space, super light and the magnetic bits are amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed this for working with 3D prints that require small screws to finish.. this does the job perfectly! so many different sizes and types of drivers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cell phone tool kit
reviews.reviewText: Has every thing I need. I also use it for laptops as well.

I like that the screw driver attachment has a wheel on the end that you can spin with one finger to help loose / tighten screws. I bought this to remove small screws on an SSD heat sink and it worked perfectly. This is a great set.
I already used t to change my SSD in my laptop. I had everything i needed in kit

reviews.reviewerName: Hugo David Ramirez CortesHugo David Ramirez Cortes
reviews.reviewText: Es lo que esperaba, 100% recomendable yo los compre para poder desmontar el ventilador de mi PS5 y necesitaba un TS6, también tenía que abrir mis PS4 para limpiarlo, lass puntas son bastante resistentes, considero que tiene buena relación entre calidad y precio. 👍🏻

reviews.reviewTitle: This One Is Only Best quality Available In Market In Precision Screwdriver
reviews.reviewText: One Brush and extension is missing not come with box but this one is have best quality and very sturdy. I am very happy with this product after tried number of other brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am not particularly savy with these things but I wanted to remove my harddrive from my broken laptop and change the screen on my iphone, I found this perfect for fiddling about with the laptop. Loads of different bits come with it and I imagine I can do plenty more things with the kit that I haven't yet explored. Overall, very reasonably priced and very happy with the product.
